dialogue.speaker: COLE
dialogue.context: But RAILLY'S total attention is on their dilemma.
dialogue.speaker: RAILLY
dialogue.context: Very confused, COLE lets her drag him along the sidewalk, past ONLOOKERS. She looks crazier than he does. ANGLE ON THE CHEVY, making a sudden, urgent u-turn, almost colliding with a passing car. BRAKES SQUEAL and a HORN BLARES.
dialogue.utterance: James, trust me. We're in terrible trouble. We have to run.
